unnormalised: Bore, lokanno, ekdom dhamal vishayacher uloiya: healthcare identifiers! Mhaka mahit asa, tim randi rang pallyak yetalo ten’na kitlo dhamal asta tashi zateli. Punn mhaka visvas theva, nokarshahichea potant, ek son’neachi khaan asa zattichem.
normalised: Bore, lokanno, ek romharshak vishoyacher uloiyam... arogya olakhpatram! Mhaka khobor asa, tem rang pasrun sukhtat te pollounk kitlem ruchikar dista. Punn mhojer visvas thev, sarkari tharanchi bhitor, ek sonneachi khan asa.

unnormalised: Toka tuje Aadhaar card asa, khorench? Tem rashtriya olkhichi kalli, SIM card melounk ani tuvem jiven asta prove korpak soglem korunk ek chavi. Punn toka mahit asa Ayushman Bharat Health Account (ABHA) ID, mhunnge tuje healthcare identifier, Aadhaaracho tenekoso avaghaddo kuzin koso asa? Tumi tanka jodunk xakat, punn te ajun vegvegle vastu asat. Tuvech tuji auntychea *haldi* ceromonicher ani khorea lagnank apovn gheunk gheunchem koxem asa- tasoch vibes, punn vegvegle ghoddneo. Mujem joddlam – ABHA: 1427-9876-5432-1011. Maka asha asa maka yaad asteli mhaka zai mhunn.
normalised: Techpasun, tumchea kodden tumcho Aadhaar card asa, sori? Tem tumchem rastriya olakhachi nishani asa, ek S-I-M card mellounk ani tumi astat mhonn sid'dh korunk ek kuli. Punn tumkam khobor asa ki Ayushman Bharat Health Account (A-B-H-A) I-D, tumchem arogya olakhpatra mhonnun vollkhotat, tem Aadhaar-achem thoddem odd lagtat tasha? Tumim tankam zoddunk zata, punn te azun veg-vegle astitv astat. Tumchea kakaichea *haldi* utsovak ani asli lagink amontronn mellun gheunk vichar korat – eka sarkhe zatichi bhavna, punn veg-vegle ghoddnuk. Mhajem zodlam - A-B-H-A: ek hozar charxim satvis, no hozar atthxim sattashtti, panch hozar charxim teshtis, ek hozar ani ek. Mhaka asa ki mhaka tem yadvann astolem jevnn mhaka tem zai astolem tedna.

unnormalised: Ani magir hea soglea insurancechi vostu asa. Muje privat health insurance cardak ekdom veglo ank asa! Khorench? Ami soglem ekach jaaduchea ankacher kiteak manun ghena tankam rule korpak? Muji ICICI Lombard policy ank, udharonnache khatir, CP/12345/2023/6789 asa. He soglem yaad dovrunk kasta lagta ten’na lagnachea zonnaracher palla rotto udounchem zateli.
normalised: Uprant tho sari vo sampurna bima vishoy asa. Mhajea khasgi arogya bima card-ak sampurna veglli ankdo asa! Khas korun? Aami sogle ekuch jadu ankdyacher ekvotta korun tankam sogleancher hukum choloita zata? Mhajem I-C-I-C-I Lombard yojana ankdo, udahornak, C-P slash ek don tin char panch slash don hozar ani tesvis slash so satt atth no. Tankam soglem yadvann dovrunk ek lagin utsovacher dhagdhagit *rotis* jagle korunk zata tasha dista.

unnormalised: Ani employer-dil’lea insurancecher uloilo puro. Achanak, hanv ek naven alphanumeric codecher tachel’lem asa tem ek caffeinated chimpanzee-n keyboardacher zaito gullyo kel’lem koxem dekhota. Muje company-chi group medical insurance card Star Health-achi asa taka hea GEM ID asa: STAR-EMP-0001-2024. Tem samzun gheunk tuvem dukhent doubled over zanvchea vellar kiteim claim korpak!
normalised: Ani niyojak-provid bima vishoyacher mhaka suru korum naka. Achank, hanv ek sampurn nove aksharank-ankdyank polloyta zata tem ek caffein aslolea chimpanzein ek keyboard-acher toyar kelam tasha dista. Mhajea company-achem group medical bima card Star Health kadchem asa techak G-E-M I-D asa: S-T-A-R hyphen E-M-P hyphen zero zero zero ek hyphen don hozar ani chauvis. Bhagevon tumi tenka ujvo korunk saktelear jevnn tumi kiteak tori zai mhonn davo korunk dukhen bhartelim astat!

unnormalised: Tanchi sankhya kitlinch zait asteli mhunn mhaka stress-an dukho dil’lo – zo, irony mhunn, zai asat... wait for it... ank ek treatment melounk! Tem ek dusht chakra! Hanv arda asha asa mujo chaiwallah loyalty card dil’lim start korunk tankanch zait asat ankacher mujo rozacho consumpiton tracker. Maka eka chaya ID asteli: CHAI-DL-123-456.
normalised: Hem olakhpatranchi sankhya koshi aamchya bhagak diunchem tumi koirache uttejan divn dukh divn kornam... jevnn, hallaik, zai mhonn...vat zait... anik olakhpatra upchar mellounk! Tem ek bhayankar chakra asa! Hanv ardhoch vicharta mhojem chaiwallah tankanchi khasgi I-D sankhyacher loyalty card diunk suru kortalem aamchem disachem kharche uddes divnk. Mhaka chai I-D astolem: C-H-A-I hyphen D-L hyphen ek don tin hyphen char panch so.

unnormalised: He system mhaka mhataro maka hat udounk zateli ani Himalayant sadhu zanvk zateli, zatant maka zai zateli ek identifier mhunnge "lamba dadichea ghel’leanchea ghel’leanchea" mhunn. Punn alas, maka responsibilities asat. Vegvegle insurance plans dilear vegvegle identifiers dilear.
normalised: Hi paddhat mhaka mhaje hat ukhloun Himalaya-cher ek dukhist sadhu korunk zai korta, tho mhojem zai asli olakh mhonnlear "khoop lamb darhi aslolea monis." Punn afsos, mhaka zobabdareo asat. Techpasun tankam veg-vegle bima yojana veg-vegle olakhpatram sangta diunk zai astolem.

unnormalised: Bore, dusrea vellar tuvem ek medical form bhortolo ten’na ani ‘Policy Number’ fieldacher bhorlo ten’na hea blog postachem yaad dovra. Hasteli, rudteli, ani borem asta. Tumek ek 50/50 chance asteli tanko bore korun melounk... zateli. Ani tuvem chuk korun dil’le ten’na, identifiersancher dosh divonk. Tim hea kathanachea khorea villains asat.
normalised: Techpasun, tumi ek medical form bhortelim astat ani ‘Policy Number’ jagher polloyta astolem tedna, hem blog post yadvann dovrat. Hasat, rodat, ani uprant ek andaj marat. Tumchya kodden pachas bhagile panchassank tem ujea korunk meltolem… zait. Ani jevnn tumi bhul korete, tankam olakhpatrak dosh diiat. Te asli kathaiche dusht astat.
